title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS:

The Amazing Spider-Man 2

Release Date: 4/2014 Protection: Steam
Discs: 1 Genre: Action

The Amazing Spider-Man 2 takes place outside the events of the 2nd film
in a unique story where Spider-Man discovers a larger threat to NYC
that has turned the underworld upside down. Villains from the film
and classic Marvel characters come together in a twisted web of
adrenaline-fueled, web-slinging action

Extract
Burn or mount the .iso
Run setup.exe and install to your desired location
Copy crack from CODEX folder to your installdir
Play

Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
online

nothing but competition!
